title: SpatRaster
text:
2




Matrix{Float64}



SpatRaster{Float64}: Raster
  A        :   b        : bbox(-180.0, -90.0, 180.0, 90.0)
  cellsize : (2.0, 2.0)
  lon, lat : -179.0:2.0:179.0, 89.0:-2.0:-89.0
  bands    : nothing
  nodata   : nothing




 | (180, 90) | 0.12 Mb
